name: Gian Carlo Valencia Ferry
description: Born in the Philippines, raised in Spain. I am a student in IES Emili Darder, currently studying 2a Desarrollo de Aplicaciones Web. I like to learn new things, especially in the field of technology. I am a Web  Developer, and Freelancer. I like helping people to solve their problems, especially in computer stuff. I have passion building PCs, play video games time to time. I want to be a Professional Web Developer in the future.
